name: Castle Survive
description:
The apartment is haunted. Run! Go back to your room and hide. Don't get caught by ghosts.
This is a thrilling horror style tower defense game. In the game, you need to avoid the chase of ghosts and find a suitable dormitory to hide. At the same time, develop the economy, build turrets, and defend against the attacks of ghosts. You can only build buildings on empty floors in rooms. You also need to selectively build buildings according to your current economy and find a path that suits your own development. You need to resist the chase of ghosts. Once you are caught by ghosts, the game will fail.
Come and join the exciting adventure! Try your best to survive!
Shh, the ghost is coming. Run!

Features:
-Exquisite gothic scene
-Vivid characters to collect
-Rich props & special skills to choose from
-Various game modes bring you different fears
